name: Metrophobia
storyline:
You find yourself trapped in an eerie and seemingly abandoned metro station. There are no people in sight, yet an unsettling feeling of someone—or something—lurking in the shadows never leaves you. Your objective is simple yet daunting: escape the metro. However, every time you step through the exit, you find yourself back at the beginning, caught in a mysterious and never-ending loop.

As you explore the dim, unsettling tunnels, anomalies begin to reveal themselves—subtle at first, like objects slightly out of place, but quickly escalating into something more sinister. These anomalies twist your perception of reality, constantly blurring the lines between the mundane and the horrifying. Even though the environment appears lifeless, it reacts to your actions, and each new loop reveals fresh, bizarre distortions of the familiar station.

The further you progress, the more the anomalies intensify, and soon you're faced not only with unsettling dissonances but also terrifying beings that emerge from the shadows. Staying vigilant becomes a matter of life and death, as even a single wrong move might bring you face-to-face with a lethal monstrosity. To survive, you must adapt to the evolving horrors and outsmart the unknown forces that dwell within the metro.
summary: Trapped in an abandoned metro, you must escape an ever-repeating station filled with anomalies and lurking horrors. Face over 100 unique disturbances and terrifying beings as you struggle to break free.
